intro.dialog_rand1: |C3|Self doubt starts to creep through her mind.
intro.dialog_rand2: |C3|She begins to have doubts about her abilities.
intro.dialog_rand3: |C3|She starts to feel a little tired.

intro.dialog_rand1: |C3|She knows that the path ahead can only get more difficult.
intro.dialog_rand2: |C3|She knows that the battles ahead can only get tougher.
intro.dialog_rand3: |C3|She knows that the monsters can only get more powerful.

intro.dialog: |C3|She stops to take a short rest.

intro_short_a.dialog_rand1: |C3|Self doubt starts to creep through her mind.
intro_short_a.dialog_rand2: |C3|She begins to have doubts about her abilities.
intro_short_a.dialog_rand3: |C3|She starts to feel a little tired.
intro_short_a.dialog_rand4: |C3|She knows that the path ahead can only get more difficult.
intro_short_a.dialog_rand5: |C3|She knows that the battles ahead can only get tougher.
intro_short_a.dialog_rand6: |C3|She knows that the monsters can only get more powerful.

intro_short_a.dialog: |C3|She stops to take a short rest.

ask1_b: I should rest a little more
info_first_b: Monster power will be reduced to level [VAL1]
info_b:
Monster power will be reduced to level [VAL1]
-[VAL2] Karma

keep_level.dialog: |C3|She quickly shakes off all feelings of self doubt.
|C3|She continues onward with full confidence in her ability.

leave_lower.dialog: |C3|She sets out again with confidence in her ability.

min_level_reached.dialog: |C3|The power of the monsters is reduced, but it can't be lowered any further.
|C3|After resting for a while, she leaves with renewed confidence in her ability.

lower_level_1.dialog: |C3|She rests for a little while longer.
|C3|The power of the monsters is slightly reduced.

lower_level_2.dialog: |C3|She continues to rest for a while.
|C3|The power of the monsters is reduced again.

lower_level_3.dialog: |C3|After a long rest, she leaves with renewed confidence in her ability.
